title: Book of Hours, Use of Rome
additional_titles: Ownership note, J. D. Moyreau|Verse inscriptions, eighteenth century|Catalog clipping and typewritten inscription|Ownership notes in pencil, John Frederick Lewis|Calendar|Gospel Lessons from John, Luke, and Matthew followed by Passion according to John|Hours of the Virgin, Use of Rome (first page and miniature of Vespers missing)|Hours of the Cross and Hours of the Holy Spirit, intercalated, followed by Seven Penitential Psalms, Litany, and Prayers|Office of the Dead (Vespers only)|Inscription, in French, "Air lugubre sur le subjet du tableau qui est dans la chapelle de la conciergerie d'Issoudun," eighteenth century|Latin inscription, eighteenth century
